Room.Name: Kafkan Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Kafkan Way, running parallel to the City Walls.
Room.LongDescription: On the north side of the road, you can see the Highland Stables, where visitors may leave their horses while staying in Oceancrest. It is very hazardous to be riding a horse in Oceancrest, both for the horse and for the pedestrians walking the streets. Furthermore, it's almost impossible to find a place to leave your horse when you go into a shop. Therefore, the city asks that people leave their steeds at one of the many stables in town.
